# Interface IntentMatcherFactoryInterface

Interface for intent matcher factory parameters.

interface IntentMatcherFactoryInterface {  
config: [IntentMatcherCreationConfigInterface](./primitives_intent_intent_matcher_creation_config.IntentMatcherCreationConfigInterface);  
llm?: [LLM](/classes/primitives_llm_llm.LLM);  
textEmbedder?: [TextEmbedder](/classes/primitives_embedder_embedder.TextEmbedder);  
}
